channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mozilla patches Firefox bug ‘exploited in the wild’, similar to bug attacking Chrome
item.description: The bug fix comes days after Google fixed a similar vulnerability under attack in its Chrome browser.

item.title: Sperm Stem Cells Were Used for the First Time in an Attempt to Restore Fertility
item.description: In an advance for treating male infertility, researchers transplanted a patient with his own sperm-forming stem cells that were collected from testicu...

item.title: YC-backed Taxo raises $5M to slash healthcare admin with its AI ‘reasoning engine’
item.description: YC-backed startup Taxo has raised a $5m seed round to save doctors time and money on admin work.

item.title: Anthropic's Claude Is Good at Poetry—and Bullshitting
item.description: Researchers looked inside the chatbot’s “brain.” The results were surprisingly chilling.

item.title: WhatsApp users can now add songs to their Status updates
item.description: WhatsApp launched a new feature on Friday, where users can include brief music clips in their Status updates, reminiscent of the Myspace era. Status r...

item.title: Nikola founder Trevor Milton pardoned by Trump
item.description: Trevor Milton, the founder of bankrupt hydrogen trucking startup Nikola who was convicted of fraud, has been pardoned by President Trump, the White Ho...

item.title: 5 Best Phones With Headphone Jacks (2025): Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Headphone jacks are endangered, but they’re not gone. Here are our favorite smartphones that still let you plug and play.

item.title: 4 Best Smart Displays (2025): Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa
item.description: Ever wish you could smash a tablet and smart speaker together? These devices offer the best of both.

item.title: Google rolls out user choice billing on Google Play in the UK
item.description: Google said today that it will start offering user choice billing in the U.K., giving Google Play developers the ability to use other billing options ...

item.title: DOGE Plans to Rebuild SSA Codebase In Months, Risking Benefits and System Collapse
item.description: Social Security systems contain tens of millions of lines of code written in COBOL, an archaic programming language. Safely rewriting that code would ...
